scenes.action_text: BLACKBERRY Written by Matt Johnson & Matthew Miller Shooting Script Based on, "Losing the Signal" by Jacquie McNish & Sean Silcoff TEXT ON SCREEN: The following fictionalization is inspired by real people and real events that took place in Waterloo, Ontario.
